# Qwizzeria

> Turn any gathering into a smart game night.

Qwizzeria is a web-based quiz platform for playing, hosting, and competing in beautifully designed quizzes.

## Pages

- / — Landing page with links to play, browse packs, and view leaderboard
- /play/free — Play a free quiz with random questions in a Jeopardy-style grid
- /packs — Browse curated quiz packs by category
- /leaderboard — Global leaderboard with time filters

## Features

- Free Quiz: 3x3 Jeopardy grid with random questions
- Quiz Packs: Curated question sets with Jeopardy or Sequential play modes
- Host Mode: Multiplayer quiz hosting with timer and live scoreboard (2-8 players)
- Leaderboard: Global and per-pack rankings
- Premium packs available via Patreon
